snippet: The company said it could not reach an agreement with its lender on a large-scale closing plan as part of its turnaround attempt.
abstract: RadioShack fails to come to an agreement with its lenders that would allow it to close 1,100 stores, although it says it will still shutter a number of outlets as part of plan to turn around struggling company; current credit agreement allows it to close only 200 stores a year.
lead_paragraph: The company said it could not reach an agreement with its lender on a large-scale closing plan as part of its turnaround attempt.

headline.main: RadioShack Pulls Back on Size of Store Closings
headline.print_headline: RadioShack Pulls Back on Size of Store Closings
